spec_data.Name: perl-IO-Any
spec_data.Description:
The aim is to provide read/write anything. The module tries to guess what
the "anything" is based on some rules. See "new" method Pod for examples
and "new" and "_guess_what" code for the implementation.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:29:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Read or write files, folders, or strings, guessing the correct object type
